content:
See the top gainers, losers, invest and get updated what's happening in the crypto market

Discover the secret world of unlisted shares — analyse India's top pre-IPO companies and invest before they hit the markets

Planning your 2026 travels? Discover the top 10 trending travel destinations worldwide, from Madeira to Abu Dhabi, based on global traveller reviews and ratings.

AR Rahman’s patriotic songs, from Maa Tujhe Salaam to Rang De Basanti, have become anthems celebrating India’s spirit, unity, and resilience. His compositions blend soulful melodies and powerful lyrics, inspiring pride and stirring emotions across generations.

With social media flooded by throwback posts revisiting 2016, Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover’s old photos are once again winning hearts. The couple’s candid engagement, holiday and wedding moments feel especially relevant today, reminding fans of a time when celebrity love stories were shared with simple, unfiltered warmth.

Fans are gearing up for Jana Nayagan, which will be in theaters on January 9, 2026, during the Pongal festival. People say that this is Thalapathy Vijay's last movie before he becomes a full-time politician. Before Jana Nayagan comes out in theaters, you should see these eight movies.

The “2026 is the new 2016” trend has taken social media by storm, with users and celebrities alike sharing decade‑old photos, videos, and memories from 2016, a year many recall as a simpler, carefree time. Bollywood stars such as Kareena Kapoor Khan, Alia Bhatt, Ananya Panday, Khushi Kapoor, Sonam Kapoor, and Dia Mirza have all joined the viral nostalgia wave, delighting fans with personal throwbacks and contributing to the trend’s widespread popularity online.

Sectorally, Nifty Consumer Durables, Realty, Pharma, Healthcare shed 2 percent each, Nifty Auto index slipped 1.75 percent and Nifty Media index down 1 percent during the week.

From the Greenland shark to the ocean quahog, here are 8 animals that live for centuries or even millennia, defying nature’s limits and offering a glimpse into Earth’s most extraordinary lifespans.

As January 16 marks the birthday of actor Sidharth Malhotra, it is the perfect moment to reflect on his inspiring and resilient journey in Bollywood. From his much-awaited debut in Student of the Year (SOTY) to evolving into a versatile actor, Sidharth has steadily carved a niche for himself in the industry.

Versatile actor Vijay Sethupathi turns a year older today, and his journey continues to inspire millions. Fondly called “Makkal Selvan”, he stands as a powerful reminder that talent, perseverance and humility can carve an extraordinary path in cinema.

Nabha Natesh plays Parvathi in Nagabandham, embracing a serene mythological avatar. Her first look highlights devotion, symbolism, and inner strength, marking a graceful shift from contemporary roles to pan-India spectacle.

Planning a solo trip in 2026? From London and New York to Bali and Hanoi, discover the world’s 10 best destinations for solo travellers, ranked for safety, culture, food and unforgettable experiences.

As the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) elections took place in Mumbai on January 15, several Bollywood celebrities and public figures arrived at the Gandhi Shikshan Bhavan polling station to cast their votes. Stars not only exercised their civic duties but also encouraged the public to actively participate in the democratic process.

On Army Day, a look at Bollywood actors who powerfully portrayed Indian Army officers and brought their bravery and sacrifice to life on screen. From real-life war heroes to fictional soldiers, these performances continue to inspire patriotism and respect for the armed forces.

Here’s a simple guide on how to download Instagram reels legally on your phone, including safe options within the app and what to avoid to stay within Instagram’s rules.

Here’s a simple guide on how to use ChatGPT to write emails, resumes and cover letters, with tips on prompts, tone, and final editing to get better results.

Kriti Sanon shares unseen moments from Nupur Sanon and Stebin Ben’s wedding, featuring mehendi rituals, emotional hugs, bridal entries, joyful ceremonies, family portraits, candid laughter, and celebratory dances, capturing love, sisterhood, and the warmth of an intimate, elegant wedding celebration.

Keerthy Suresh blends traditional South Indian elegance with modern flair in a series of vibrant Pongal-ready ensembles. From classic Kasavu sarees to contemporary floral silhouettes, her looks offer perfect festive inspiration for the harvest season.

There are many TV characters who have explored different facets of their family life, romance, and drama; however, when it comes to their jobs, despite being qualified and hardworking, they have failed miserably at their jobs.

Blaupunkt Audio India has announced the launch of the BH71 Moksha Hybrid ANC Headphones in India, marking its entry into advanced spatial audio for personal listening.

Discover the 10 most romantic places in the world to propose in 2026. From Bali to Paris, explore dreamy destinations perfect for unforgettable “Will you marry me?” moments.

Discover the world’s 12 most relaxing cities to visit right now, from sun-soaked beaches to green urban escapes perfect for slow, stress-free travel.

As BTS steps into 2026, the world is ready. Their reunion stands as a testament to longevity, loyalty, and the enduring power of music to connect generations across borders.

Dreame Technology has announced Republic Day sale offers in India with discounts of up to 72 percent on robotic vacuums, stick vacuums, wet-and-dry cleaners, and grooming products via Amazon and Croma.

Nupur Sanon’s wedding to singer Stebin Ben was a beautiful blend of tradition, emotion and quiet joy. From intimate rituals to grand celebratory moments, the ceremony reflected love, family and togetherness at its heart.

Discover the top 10 noctourism destinations for 2026, from Rome’s twilight tours to Thailand’s Full Moon Parties. Explore cities that come alive after dark with night markets, stargazing, cultural tours, and more.
